channel.title: Need help with making moparscape server
channel.description: Ok, so i followed this guide http://forum.ragezone.com/f368/tut-creating-your-own-server-coding-265036/ and i got the part where you have to use compiler and i am using mod tharoks compiler. I then downloaded JDK 6u2 and installed it on my comp. I then clicked compile and it came up as this: You need JDK5.0 or 6.0 go to mod tharoks guide and download the java update. i have it on my comp but do i have to run it or extract it or something plz help :confused:[br][size=1]Posted on: August 07, 2007, 10:33:20 PM[/size][hr]IF U HELP U GET FREE ADMIN ON SERVER CYALL IN MORNIN[br][size=1]Posted on: August 07, 2007, 10:36:26 PM[/size][hr]help plz ppl

item.source: Need help with making moparscape server

item.title: Need help with making moparscape server
item.dc:creator: @green_dude green dude
item.description:
@green_dude wrote:

Hi there.

Well then you can just try the regular compiler…Create a new file with .bat extension,edit it with notepad and type in :

@echo off title YourServerName "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

NOTE : C:\Program Files\Java\jdk 1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe is just an example version and directory of JDK.If your JDK is another verison,or it’s in another folder,change C:\Program Files\Java\jdk 1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe to JDK’s javac.exe proper location.

If this is not working,the error isn’t comming from a compiler.Try installing the newest JRE and JDK and setting your paths and classpaths for easier acces.

Good luck.[br][size=1]Posted on: August 08, 2007, 01:25:15 PM[/size][hr]Hi again,

I think I missed something.
You may have older version of Tharok’s Perfect compiler so It may be only compatible with other versions.In that case,my previous post will help.

Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with making moparscape server
item.dc:creator: @green_dude green dude
item.description:
@green_dude wrote:

Well,

You have Tharok’s perfect compiler.There are a few things you can do.

  1. Check mod Tharoks guide about the compiler,there should be something about it.
  2. Or you can start all over again,follow a new guide ( for example in moparscape,there are tons here ) and use a different compiler.

Good luck.

Read full topic
